General.Name: JinJian Cereals Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Jinjian Cereals Industry Co.,Ltd. produces, processes, and sells grain and oil products in China. The company offers rice, noodles, oil, milk, snack food, flour, candy and jelly, milk, vegetable oil, and agricultural products. It exports its products. Jinjian Cereals Industry Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Changde, China.
